name: type-check-system
description: A simple type checker for JavaScript inspired by Meteor's check.

scripts.coverage-html: jscoverage lib lib-cov && NODE_COV=1 NODE_ENV=test mocha ./test/*.js -R html-cov > coverage.html && rm -rf lib-cov
scripts.coverage: jscoverage lib lib-cov && NODE_COV=1 NODE_ENV=test mocha ./test/*.js -R mocha-lcov-reporter > coverage.lcov && rm -rf lib-cov

author: Martijn de Haan
